metadata.description: Canonical machine-readable feature map for rapid codebase navigation and targeted verification.
metadata.update_expectation: Whenever a feature is introduced, changed significantly, or removed, update or explicitly verify impacted entries in this file.

verification_rules: Whenever a feature is introduced, changed significantly, or removed, update or explicitly verify impacted entries.
Every directory under frontend/features must appear in coverage.frontend_feature_dirs.
Every frontend feature directory in coverage.frontend_feature_dirs must appear in at least one features[].frontend.feature_dirs entry.
